pkgmetadata.longdescription:
LateralGM is a cross platform Game Maker editor and IDE. It allows game designers to rearrange the scene and levels.
Due to dialog filters, only the following asset formats are supported
Images: apng, bmp, gif, ico, jpeg, wbmp Sounds: it, flac, gfs, mid, minigfs, mod, mp3, nfs, ogg, s3m, wav, xm Shaders: gles, glsles, hlsl9, hlsl11 Project save: gm6, gm81, gmk, project.gmx, Project load: project.gmx, gb1, ..., gb7, gm6, gm8, gm81 gmd, gmk,

use.flag: Installs the jar in ENIGMA's Android only platform.
